com.lukflug.panelstudio.mc8fabric

Class GLInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lukflug.panelstudio.mc8fabric.GLInterface
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MinecraftGUI.GUIInterface

    public abstract class GLInterface
extends java.lang.Object
implements IInterface
    Implementation of IInterface for OpenGL in Minecraft.

      • loadImage

        public int loadImage(java.lang.String name)
        Description copied from interface: IInterface
        Load an image into memory and return a number that may be used to draw that image. Should only be called during initialization. The name string should ideally be the filename of the image, not including the path, since the implementation of this interface must ideally provide the directory in which the images are located.
        Specified by:
        loadImage in interface IInterface
        Parameters:
        name - a string indicating the location of the image to be loaded
        Returns:
        a number identifying the image
        See Also:
        IInterface.drawImage(Rectangle, int, boolean, int), IInterface.drawImage(Rectangle, int, boolean, int, Color)

      • drawImage

        public void drawImage(java.awt.Rectangle r,
                      int rotation,
                      boolean parity,
                      int image,
                      java.awt.Color color)
        Description copied from interface: IInterface
        Draw an image.
        Specified by:
        drawImage in interface IInterface
        Parameters:
        r - the rectangle specifying the position of the image
        rotation - the rotation of the image in units of 90 degrees counter-clockwise
        parity - if true, will flip the image around the vertical axis
        image - the number identifying the image
        color - the color to modulate the image by
        See Also:
        IInterface.loadImage(String)

      • scissor

        protected void scissor(java.awt.Rectangle r)
        Utility function to set clipping rectangle.
        Parameters:
        r - the clipping rectangle

      • window

        public void window(java.awt.Rectangle r)
        Description copied from interface: IInterface
        Clip all rendering on screen outside the intersection of the specified rectangle and the current clipping rectangle. May only be called in a GUI rendering method. The calling method should restore clipping by calling IInterface.restore() after rendering.
        Specified by:
        window in interface IInterface
        Parameters:
        r - the clipping rectangle
        See Also:
        IInterface.restore()

      • restore

        public void restore()
        Description copied from interface: IInterface
        Restore the clipping to the previous state.
        Specified by:
        restore in interface IInterface
        See Also:
        IInterface.window(Rectangle)

      • begin

        public void begin(boolean matrix)
        Set OpenGL to the state used by the rendering methods. Should be called before rendering.
        Parameters:
        matrix - whether to set up the modelview matrix

      • end

        public void end(boolean matrix)
        Restore OpenGL to the state expected by Minecraft. Should be called after rendering.
        Parameters:
        matrix - whether to restore the modelview matrix
